name: water snake
description:
Goal: to live as long as possible.

Control:

up, down, right, left

2 minutes of life.

If you eat a creep with a greep eye, your lifespan will increase, your tail will lengthene and your speed will decrease.

If you eat a creep with a red eye, you will lose three tail items (including the head) and your speed will increase. If creep eats your head, you will die.
